many people are affected by dihydropyrimidinase deficiency ?,Dihydropyrimidinase deficiency is thought to be a rare disorder. Only a few dozen affected individuals have been described in the medical literature.,GHR,dihydropyrimidinase deficiency
What are the genetic changes related to dihydropyrimidinase deficiency ?,"Dihydropyrimidinase deficiency is caused by mutations in the DPYS gene, which provides instructions for making an enzyme called dihydropyrimidinase. This enzyme is involved in the
